examples.title: List all cPanel accounts
examples.prompt: List all cPanel accounts on the WHM server
examples.expected_output: Array of accounts with username, domain, disk usage, and status

examples.title: Create new cPanel account
examples.prompt: Create a new cPanel account for domain 'newclient.com' with username 'newclient' and a strong password
examples.expected_output: Success confirmation with new account details

examples.title: Suspend account for non-payment
examples.prompt: Suspend the account 'badclient' due to non-payment

examples.title: List all DNS zones
examples.prompt: Show me all DNS zones on this server
examples.expected_output: List of zones with domain names and record counts

examples.title: Get DNS records for domain
examples.prompt: Show all DNS records for example.com
examples.expected_output: Complete DNS zone file with all A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT records

examples.title: Add A record
examples.prompt: Add an A record for www.example.com pointing to 192.0.2.1

examples.title: Add MX record
examples.prompt: Add MX record for example.com pointing to mail.example.com with priority 10

examples.title: Add TXT record for SPF
examples.prompt: Add SPF record for example.com

examples.title: Check server status
examples.prompt: What is the current server status?
examples.expected_output: Server uptime, load average, memory usage, disk usage

examples.title: Check service health
examples.prompt: Is Apache/httpd running?

examples.title: Get server load
examples.prompt: Show me the server load and memory usage
examples.expected_output: Load averages (1/5/15 min), memory usage, disk space, uptime

examples.title: List files in account
examples.prompt: List files in the public_html directory for account 'example'

examples.title: Read .htaccess file
examples.prompt: Show me the contents of .htaccess for account 'example'

examples.title: Check Apache error log
examples.prompt: Show me the last 100 lines of the Apache error log

examples.title: Morning server health check
examples.prompt: Give me a morning health check: server status, load, and any recent errors

examples.title: New client onboarding
examples.prompt: Set up a new client: create account 'newco' for domain 'newcompany.com', add www A record pointing to server IP, and add MX records for mail

examples.title: Suspend non-paying client
examples.prompt: Client 'badpayer' hasn't paid for 30 days - suspend their account and document the reason

examples.title: Investigate email delivery issues
examples.prompt: Client reports emails not being delivered - check DNS MX records for clientdomain.com and exim mail logs

examples.title: Website not loading
examples.prompt: Client's website example.com is not loading - check DNS A records, Apache status, and error logs

examples.title: Bulk account creation for reseller
examples.prompt: Create 5 cPanel accounts for reseller packages: client1.com through client5.com

examples.title: Setup DKIM record
examples.prompt: Add DKIM TXT record for mail._domainkey.example.com

examples.title: Add DMARC policy
examples.prompt: Add DMARC policy for example.com with quarantine mode

examples.title: Setup subdomain A record
examples.prompt: Point blog.example.com to 192.0.2.50

examples.title: Check MySQL service health
examples.prompt: Is MySQL running properly?

examples.title: Backup .htaccess before changes
examples.prompt: Read current .htaccess for account example before modifying

examples.title: End of day account audit
examples.prompt: Show all suspended accounts and disk usage summary
examples.expected_output: Account status report with disk metrics

examples.title: High server load investigation
examples.prompt: Server load is high - check load average, top processes, and MySQL status

examples.title: SSL certificate issue
examples.prompt: Client reports SSL errors on example.com - check HTTPS access and certificate

examples.title: Audit recent account changes
examples.prompt: List all accounts created or modified in the last 24 hours

examples.title: Review failed login attempts
examples.prompt: Check secure log for failed SSH and cPanel login attempts

examples.title: Prepare account for migration
examples.prompt: Get complete info for account migrationclient before moving to new server
